Original title: It Happened One Night (1934) 
Director: Frank Capra 
Screenplay: Robert Riskin, from a story by Samuel Hopkins Adams 
Music: Howard Jackson 
Photography: Joseph Walker (B & W) 
Studio: Columbia Pictures 
Awards 1934: 5 Oscars: Picture, director, actor (Clark Gable), Actress (Colbert), Screenplay 
Genre: Romance. Comedy | Romantic comedy. Road Movie 
Length: 105 min 
Cast: Clark Gable, Claudette Colbert, Walter Connolly, Roscoe Karns, Jameson Thomas, Ward Bond, Eddy Chandler, Arthur Hoyt, Alan Hale 

Synopsis: 
-------------- 
Ellie Andrews, a whimsical young heiress, escaped her father's yacht, which had been locked to prevent her marriage to a man unreliable. Then take a bus to New York. One of the passengers happens to be Peter Warne, a friendly and attractive reporter, looking for a good story. The fate and circumstances join Ellie and Peter in a rugged and fun trip.
